channel.title: Need help,, Froze when died,
channel.description: Hey, ive added my clan wars area, and all work but when someone died they cant move,, Any suggestion's ?

item.title: Need help,, Froze when died,
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:4, topic:288065"]Return the IsDead boolean to false once the player has died.

If that doesn’t fix it, then show us the rest of the code you use for player death.[/quote]this dont happend at pking and this, only at funpk, And how i return the idead to false?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help,, Froze when died,
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Return the IsDead boolean to false once the player has died.

Also, show us the rest of the code you use for player death.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help,, Froze when died,
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

I tried to make a funpk area and here what i posted,

// If killed apply dead if ((absX >=3250 && absX <=3268 && absY >=3079 && absY <=3125 && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1)) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]); playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); teleportToX = 3304; teleportToY = 3123; sendMessage("You died at funpk!"); }

Read full topic
